forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 19C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 66F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 63F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.
